channel.title: Cant pk everywhere
channel.description: I have a nicoscape source and its a pking server, you pk in only certain places like gorrock and others, when i added pk everywhere it still doesnt work someone please help me

item.title: Cant pk everywhere
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

sigh

search for nonWild() {
there will be loads of stuff after it, remove it all and just make your own safe zones:

if((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY)

replace the xxxx and yyyy with the co ordinates of your safety zone

Read full topic
